Class Square

  • java.lang.Object
    • Square

  • class Square
extends java.lang.Object

    Square

    The Square class is basic unit of Board

    There is four types of Square: Ladder, chute, normal, start(every player located on this before game start) enum: specify what kind of Square

    Since:
    2018-5-26
    Author:
    David Ji

      specific position in the game board
      private int nextPos

      private SquareType type
      what kind of square type
